snippet: Russia beat the United States, 5-3, in Stockholm, preserving its perfect start at the ice hockey world championship.
abstract: Russia beats United States, 5-3, in Stockholm, preserving its perfect start at ice hockey world championship.
lead_paragraph: Russia beat the United States, 5-3, in Stockholm, preserving its perfect start at the ice hockey world championship.

headline.main: Russia Defeats United States in Hockey
